name: Multiple Needs Story
description: Story with multiple overlapping need categories
transcript: Hi, I'm called Robert Chen. I'm a veteran who recently returned from service. I'm having a really hard time adjusting to civilian life. I need help finding a job - I've sent out dozens of applications but haven't heard back. I also need housing because I'm currently staying at a veterans' shelter in San Diego. I need food assistance and I also need counseling for PTSD. I want to get my education too - I'd like to go to college. I need help with all of these things. Contact me at robert.chen.vet@email.com or call 619-555-4321. I just want to rebuild my life.

segments.text: I'm a veteran who recently returned from service.
I'm having a really hard time adjusting to civilian life.
I need help finding a job - I've sent out dozens of applications but haven't heard back.
I also need housing because I'm currently staying at a veterans' shelter in San Diego.
I need food assistance and I also need counseling for PTSD.
I want to get my education too - I'd like to go to college.
I need help with all of these things.
Contact me at robert.chen.vet@email.com or call 619-555-4321.
I just want to rebuild my life.
